summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the About section to point to /assets/generated/ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg while preserving a square container and object-cover styling. However, the change set also introduces references to updating the Hero/front-page background in project metadata/summaries, which was explicitly a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero/front-page background update (lighter/professional background image with gradient overlay) referenced as part of the change set, despite being a non-goal for this build request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states: "Do not change Hero/front-page background styling in this build request." The diff summary includes updated metadata describing a new hero background image/overlay.
